quotes.quote: It's funny how complete strangers can have familiar souls.
Giving someone a piece of your soul is better than giving a piece of your heart. Because souls are eternal.

And when one of them meets the other half, the actual half of himself, whether he be a lover of youth or a lover of another sort, the pair are lost in an amazement of love and friendship and intimacy and one will not be out of the other's sight, as I may say, even for a moment.
There was something in her eyes that made me trust her. Maybe it was because they held the same cynicism, the same world-weariness I saw in my own every morning when I looked at myself in the mirror.
Life is a lease and God is the landlord.
It goes without saying that any persons may attempt to unite kindred spirits, but, whatever their hopes and longings, none have the right to impose their vision of unity upon the rest.
You have half our gifts. I the other. Together we make a whole. Together we are much more powerful.
Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
There's something beautiful about finding one's innermost thoughts in another.
Find my hand in the darkness, intertwined you will be the day to my night. We can share wings and take flight towards our own inner light.

A soulmate is someone who has locks that fit our keys, and keys to fit our locks. When we feel safe enough to open the locks, our truest selves step out and we can be completely and honestly who we are; we can be loved for who we are and not for who we're pretending to be. Each unveils the best part of the other. No matter what else goes wrong around us, with that one person, we're safe in our own paradise.
Kindred spirits are not so scarce as I used to think. It's splendid to find out there are so many of them in the world.
There's magic in recognizing a kindred spirit, and an even greater power in letting yourself love them. When it scares you, let it - that's your ego letting go.
We all take different paths in life, but no matter where we go, we take a little of each other everywhere.
Kindred spirits alone do not change with the changing years.
It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.

We are soul mates, kindred spirits, on a deep, fundamental level I believe we were made for each other. Who cares if we make each other mad occasionally. The universe planned our existence. That has to count for something.
You are the master of my heart. I am a slave to you're soul. Intertwined in a perfect embrace that I will never release myself from.
True friends are always together in spirit.
There is no such thing as a 'self-made' man. We are made up of thousands of others.
Have you ever felt really close to someone? So close that you can't understand why you and the other person have two separate bodies, two separate skins?
With some, we're certain our hearts must have been acquainted, long before we ever met them.
Soul mates recognise one another's vibration. They instantly fuse to the life force that surrounds their core of being.
To discover a kindred spirit is to find your heart in the heart of a friend.
Some people as far as your senses are concerned, just feel like home.
No one is contained by his own skin, but shares his birth, living and death with others.
People who feel empowered by your presence become kindred spirits.
Maybe the two different worlds we lived in weren't so different. We saw the same sunset.
You are truly home only when you find your tribe.
The measure of space & time creates an echo of haunting distance between us, yet we are close, we are united in the love we forge together.
Love is but the discovery of ourselves in another, and the delight in the recognition.
Twin flames burn eternal. Destine to shine bright in a united embrace that is set to last for an eternity.

Our universe grants every soul a twin, a reflection of themselves, the kindred spirit, and no matter where they are or how far away they are from each other, even if they are in different dimensions, they will always find one another. This is destiny; this is love.
You are the missing piece of my heart and soul. United we are now whole.
Birds of a feather flock together.
It's always nice to be around kindred spirits who care about the earth.
Two may talk together under the same roof for many years, yet never really meet; and two others at first speech are old friends.
Than smoke and mist who better could appraise, the kindred spirit of an inner haze?
A bond between souls is ancient â€“ older than the planet.
We are kindred spirits, you and I... One day you will realize you don't have to fight your nature. You can live your life freely... I want to be there when that happens.
